text: Amarpur Dhana is a Village in Iglas Tahsil of Aligarh district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. ==Geography== ==Demographics== ==Near by Village & Towns== * Gorai * Sudama ka bas * Beswan * Shyam Gadhi == References == Category:Cities and towns in Aligarh district Category:Villages in Aligarh district
title: Amarpur Dhana
